info.title: My News Desk Pressroom List
info.description: Mynewsdesk Webservice for newsroom is a way for you, as a registered customer, to fetch information from your newsroom at Mynewsdesk to any system. You can get all your information as XML and create email subscriptions to your material.

parameters.name: blog
parameters.description: URL of commenters blog/website.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of comment.

parameters.name: commentable_id
parameters.description: ID of the material that is commented.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of commenter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of commenter.

parameters.name: type_of_media
parameters.description: Type of material. Valid values are pressrelease, news, blog_post, event, image, video, document and contact_person.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key

parameters.name: user_ip
parameters.description: IP number of commenter. This is needed for easier moderation and spam protection.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Fetch items marked as archived, this is useful for fetching old events. Example: true u2013 Fetches all the items, including archived ones

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If format is JSON and callback is specified, the JSON response is wrapped in a function call with the specified callback name.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the response: RSS 2.0, JSON or full XML.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of items in the response. This cannot be more than 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify which item (sequentially) should be first, skipping preceding items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Specify the sort order of the result: publish date (published), latest update (updated) or creation date (created).

parameters.name: pressroom
parameters.description: Set the pressroom to fetch material from. Examples: se u2013 Swedish pressroom, uk u2013 United Kingdom pressroom.

parameters.name: type_of_media
parameters.description: Type of material. Valid values are pressrelease, news, blog_post, event, image, video, document and contact_person.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key

parameters.name: pressroom
parameters.description: Set the pressroom to fetch material from. Examples: se u2013 Swedish pressroom, uk u2013 United Kingdom pressroom.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If format is JSON and callback is specified, the JSON response is wrapped in a function call with the specified callback name.

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: End date. Valid only with date modes between and before. Format: YYYY-MM-DD, e.g. 2006-12-31.

parameters.name: date_mode
parameters.description: Specifies how the date parameters are used. Valid values are: between, on, before or after.

parameters.name: date_on
parameters.description: Date. Valid only with date mode on. Format: YYYY-MM-DD, e.g. 2006-12-31

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: Start date. Valid only with date modes between and after. Format: YYYY-MM-DD, e.g. 2006-12-31.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the response: RSS 2.0, JSON or full XML.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of items in the response. This cannot be more than 100.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number in the search result

parameters.name: pressroom
parameters.description: Set the pressroom to fetch material from. Examples: se u2013 Swedish pressroom, uk u2013 United Kingdom pressroom.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search string. The search is performed on all text fields in the material, like the header, summary and body. Searching supports advanced queries with AND/OR/NOT, and wildcards (*).

parameters.name: type_of_media
parameters.description: Type of material. Valid values are pressrelease, news, blog_post, event, image, video, document and contact_person.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Name of sender.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the material to be fetched.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Personal message from the sender to the recipient.

parameters.name: to_email
parameters.description: Recipient email address.

parameters.name: type_of_media
parameters.description: Type of material. Valid values are pressrelease, news, blog_post, event, image, video, document and contact_person.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key

parameters.name: newsdesk_pressroom
parameters.description: Set the pressroom to search in. se u2013 Swedish pressroom, no u2013 Norwegian pressroom and en for international pressroom.

parameters.name: newsdesk_subscriber_email
parameters.description: Email address of the subscriber.

parameters.name: newsdesk_subscribe_to_type
parameters.description: Send a parameter with the value 1 for each type of material to be included in the subscription. At least one type is required.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If format is JSON and callback is specified, the JSON response is wrapped in a function call with the specified callback name.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the response: RSS 2.0, JSON or full XML.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the material to be fetched.

parameters.name: type_of_media
parameters.description: Type of material. Valid values are pressrelease, news, blog_post, event, image, video, document and contact_person.

parameters.name: unique key
parameters.description: The MyNewsDesk API Key
